Text: If the board approves the appropriation request and the state provides the additional support, the University's appropriation would increase from $337.2 million this year to $359.8 million in 2020-21, an overall increase of 6.7%.
Cause: If the board approves the appropriation request and the state provides the additional support
Effect: the University's appropriation would increase from $337.2 million this year to $359.8 million in 2020-21, an overall increase of 6.7%.
Sentence: <e1>If the board approves the appropriation request and the state provides the additional support</e1>, <e2>the University's appropriation would increase from $337.2 million this year to $359.8 million in 2020-21, an overall increase of 6.7%.</e2>
